ingredients.ingredient: 2 (3.4 ounce) packages instant pistachio pudding mix
1 (8 ounce) tub frozen whipped topping, thawed
3 (1.4 ounce) bars chocolate covered English toffee, chopped

cookingTips: Use cold milk to prevent pudding from separating when mixing with whipped topping
Layer cake, pudding mixture, and toffee for best flavor distribution
Chill for at least 4 hours or overnight for flavors to set
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This no-bake dessert is perfect for entertaining. How far ahead can you prepare it?
